title: Client bugged, game literally unplayable
body:
I have been having this bug for the past few patches where my client will be completely covered and I can't see anything in champ select or on the main screen (see pic attached). Everything is normal in game, it's just the client that's not working.

https://imgur.com/a/1MuroUK (current patch)
https://imgur.com/a/stKYXDs (last patch, still playable but pretty bad)

I have tried initiating a full repair and closing the client, logging out, etc. 
Can anyone help me out?
Cheers.

replies.body:
It looks like your client is missing assets. My first instinct would be that your firewall and/or anti-virus are blocking certain elements when patching. Ensuring there is an exception for League in both, and running a clean reinstall (via the Hextech Repair Tool) after that would be my first recommendation.

If that doesn't help, submit a ticket to player support and they'll be able to help you further: https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new
The client fixed itself after playing 1 game, but then came back after relogging. I'll try the hextech repair tool. Thanks mate.

https://imgur.com/a/ZqcSFbZ
That's what champ select looks like. WTF.
